一般射擊安全防禦法

1.所有槍械均當作已上彈處理
Treat every weapon as if it were loaded

2.槍咀永遠指向安全方向，切勿將槍械指向任何不欲射擊之人物或物件。
Always point the muzzle at the Safety Direction; never point the weapon to anybody or anything that you do not intend to shoot.

3.未進行射擊時，扣板機手指必須離開板機。
Keep your trigger finger out of the trigger guard until you have decided to shoot

4.停止進行射擊時，必須退下所有子彈及將槍膛打開。
When a weapon is out of custody, the muzzle must point at the Safety Direction, magazine off, bolt open and empty chamber.

5.留意標靶及其背後之情況
Be sure of your target and the backstop beyond

6.槍械必須退彈後，方可交予別人。
Unload and show clear all weapons before handing over to other person

7.當射擊活動在靶場進行中，所有在場人士必須佩帶護目及護耳裝備。
Proper eye and ear protection must always be worn when shooting are taken place in the range.

8.遵守當值教練，槍械導師及靶場主任的指示，同時，在未得到他們指示下，絕不能接觸槍彈。
Obey the order of the Coach, Range Officer and Arms Instructor; also never touch the weapon and ammunition unless you are instructed to do so by them.
